article: rome sunday summoned the libyan ambassador for talks after italian coastguards apprehended ### clandestine migrants on two boats near the island of lampedusa , south of sicily , amid mounting tension over illegal immigration .
abstract: rome summons libyan envoy after record influx of clandestine migrants
